title: Phoenix
description: Deidre Flemming should be spending her time worrying about high school, boys, and her frustrating lack of breasts. Instead she is forced into a world of horrific monsters, when a previously contained virus turns the adults around her into flesh devouring monsters. Deidre must band together with a misfit group of survivors, (none of which is over the age of eighteen) . She struggles to find her place midst the intimidating leader of the group, a little boy with many secrets, the attractive Andy, and a mysterious, but kind "goth boy". Can she rise from the ashes of this disaster and find the hero she never guessed she could become?This is the first self published book by prolific WI author Julian Greystoke (aka Emily L)
author: Emily Luebke
